name: Do Not Fall 2
description:
Welcome to Do Not Fall 2 ! 

In this second infinite platformer, try to score as high as you can, while collecting coins to spend in a whole bunch of cosmetics.

Game details:

 You play as a sphere that moves by itself, you only control the direction. Random platforms appear throughout your advancement. The sphere is moving faster and faster! Try to get as many pieces as possible on your way to get cosmetics.

Difference between Do not fall and Do Not Fall 2:

Do not fall 1 is no longer availlable.

-The first game was not infinite, it's levels.

-The sphere not move it byself.

-New moving physics

-Cosmetics is added (Actually, only 4 skins is availlable)

-New UI design.

Language: 

-English

-French

----------

The game is free, no ads, and no in-game payment.

In the future, the game will be added in the Google Play Store.

IOS version is not considered actually.

----------

Size: 18mo

The game is developped by amator. Be lenient.
